control.control: 44 30 140 164 center center font_cdvvv white black [CR][CR][CR][CR][CR][CR]$VAR[OSDSimulatedDiscartLabel2Var] false true-->

control.label: $VAR[OSDPlot]
control.visible: [Window.IsActive(fullscreeninfo) + IsEmpty(VideoPlayer.Genre) + IsEmpty(MusicPlayer.Property(hasUserRating)) + IsEmpty(MusicPlayer.Property(ratingImage)) + IsEmpty(VideoPlayer.RatingAndVotes) + IsEmpty(VideoPlayer.TVShowTitle) + !Skin.HasSetting(General.SmallPlotText) + !StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.SpinningDiscStyle),Disabled) + !StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.VideoIconStyle),Disabled)] | [[!Window.IsActive(fullscreeninfo)+ [[StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.Plot),Paused) + Player.Paused + !Player.Seeking + !Player.Caching] | StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.Plot),Always)]] + [IsEmpty(VideoPlayer.Genre) + IsEmpty(VideoPlayer.TVShowTitle)] + !Skin.HasSetting(General.SmallPlotText) + !StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.SpinningDiscStyle),Disabled) + !StringCompare(Skin.String(OSD.VideoIconStyle),Disabled) + [Skin.HasSetting(OSD.FullResolutionFlag.Enable) | Skin.HasSetting(OSD.MediaFlags.Disable)]]
